subject: Status of Order #SSN4511
description_text: Dear Simsonn-Team,  I ordered my new Pro X Ultra-P2-H2 / Baseplate on 7th December, but I haven’t received any shipping news or a shipping number. That’s the reason why I ask what my status of my order #SSN4511 is?  Could you please help me?     Thank you in advance.     Regards  Maximilian  I ordered my new Pro X Ultra-P2-H2 / Baseplate on 7th December, but haven’t received any shipping news or a shipping number. That’s the reason why I ask what the status of my order is #SSN4511. Could you please help me?  Thank you in advance.  Regards  I ordered my new Pro X Ultra-P2-H2 / Baseplate on 7th December, but haven’t received any shipping news or a shipping number. That’s the reason why I ask what the status of my order is #SSN4511. Could you please help me?  Thank you in advance.  Regards  Maximilian Rössler I ordered my new Pro X Ultra-P2-H2 / Baseplate on 7th December, but haven’t received any shipping news or a shipping number. That’s the reason why I ask what the status of my order is #SSN4511. Could you please help me?  Thank you in advance.  Regards  Maximilian Rössler

conversations.body_text: Hi Maximilian Rössler,     Your order was originally scheduled for shipment from our German warehouse, but due to transportation delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They have now arrived at the warehouse, and we are processing them for storage and arranging DHL express shipping. We will update you with the tracking number tomorrow.
